newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Dutch Oct manufacturing sales rise 11 pct yr/yr.
newsitem.headline: Dutch Oct manufacturing sales rise 11 pct yr/yr.

text.p: Dutch October manufacturing sales were some 11 percent higher than in the same month of 1995, the Central Bureau of Statistics said.
The CBS said this was the biggest year-on-year rise in manufacturing sales since May 1995.
It said October 1996 had one more working day than October 1995 and that sales were also boosted by a three percent rise in manufacturers' selling prices compared with October 1995.
The manufacturing sales figures refer to the guilder value of manufacturers' sales and are usually published one to two weeks before data showing manufacturing production volumes.
